BaseAudioContextCreateIIRFilter.summary: The createIIRFilter() method of the interface creates an , which represents a general infinite impulse response (IIR) filter which can be configured to serve as various types of filter.

blockquote.para:
The
constructor is the recommended way to create a ; see
Creating an AudioNode.

BaseAudioContextCreateIIRFilter.returns:
An implementing the filter with the specified feedback and
feedforward coefficient arrays.
